title: "General Electric Analyst Lifts Price Target After Health Care Segment Update"
excerpt: "GE Healthcare division, said in an update that management expects low-to mid-single-digit revenue growth in 2021, given rising COVID-19 cases globally, according to BofA Securities. The General Electric Analyst: Andrew Obin maintained a Buy on General Electric and raised the price target from $11 to $13."
